h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
content: The Pale-Axe Stalwart will move after you defeat the Brown-Iron Cart and Gray-Bronze Cart (as long as you've exhausted his dialogue). He'll appear as a marker next to the Keeper's Shrine called Camp of Seasons, which is the shrine that was unlocked after defeating Brown-Iron Cart.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_5_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Speak to Pale-Axe Stalwart Again'.
The content is as follows:
The Pale-Axe Stalwart will move after you defeat the Brown-Iron Cart and Gray-Bronze Cart (as long as you've exhausted his dialogue). He'll appear as a marker next to the Keeper's Shrine called Camp of Seasons, which is the shrine that was unlocked after defeating Brown-Iron Cart.
